data.text: @tompowercbc @bryanadams @taylorswift13 @willow_catelyn @tinahassannia @NaradaMWalden Can you please tell us how many times the word *like* was uttered in your interview with the young ladies in your segment about RomComs and Orson Welles. It was an absolute unending avalanche of *likes* like I have never heard before. Simple word count will do - thank you.
